idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

descript.abstract: Updated database of the Federal Railroad Administration's (FRA) Amtrak Station database. This database is a geographic data set containing Amtrak intercity railroad passenger terminals in the United States and Canada. Attribute data include services and passenger amenities provided at the station.
descript.purpose: The data set provides an updated version of the location and attribute information for all Amtrak stations in the United States and Canada. This data is used for national and network analysis applications.

idinfo.useconst: None. Acknowledgment of the Federal Railroad Administration (FRA) should be cited in products derived from these data.

cntinfo.cntpos: GIS - Office of Railroad Policy & Development

dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows XP Version 5.1 (Build 2600) Service Pack 3; ESRI ArcCatalog 9.3.1.4000

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntinfo.cntvoice: REQUIRED: The telephone number by which individuals can speak to the organization or individual.

onlinopt.accinstr: NTAD is available for download at www.bts.gov/programs/geographic_information_services. The NTAD DVD can also be ordered from the online bookstore at www.bts.gov.

stdorder.ordering: Call 202-366-DATA, or E-mail (answers@bts.gov) RITA/BTS to request the National Transportation Atlas Databases (NTAD) 2011 DVD. This and other RITA/BTS products may be ordered from the RITA/BTS Internet website http://www.bts.gov/programs/geographic_information_services/.

cntperp.cntorg: Research and Innovative Technology Administration's Bureau of Transportation Statistics (RITA/BTS)

distinfo.techpreq: Software that can process GIS files.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: City and State of the station
Street address of the station, if applicable
Name of the city the station is located in
State abbreviation which follows the postal abbreviation
Postal ZIP code for location of station

edom.edomvd: Station is a thruway bus stop

attr.attrdef: Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) State Code
attr.attrdefs: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)

codesetd.codesetn: Federal Information Processing Standard (FIPS) State Code
codesetd.codesets: National Institute of Standards and Technology (NIST)

attr.attrdef: The VERSION is a 2-digit number that will be incremented for all records in the database whenever a new release is distributed.

overview.dsoverv: A point feature layer that contain the Amtrak station locations.

procstep.procdesc: FRA's Amtrak Database was copied and the attributes for each station was compared with the Amtrak webiste. If there were any dissimilarities, the attribute table was changed. If an address of a station changed, the location of the station was observed to determine if the point had to be moved. If a station location had to be moved, it was done manually. Newly added stations were first but into a seperate shapefile (a shapefile for each geographic ragion) and were added manually by cross-referencing their location with road atlases. Then the shapefiles were added to the database.

dataqual.logic: All points records are represented by a single coordinate pair and a unique feature identifier; the Amtrak Station Code (stored in the STNCODE field). Attribute data can be matched to specific point records using this identifier.
dataqual.complete: The database contains all the Amtrak thruway bus and rail stations from the Amtrak website and Timetables in the US and Canada as of March 2009. As new stations are formed or if they move, this database should be updated accordingly.
